summary: A retexture of the Glass weapons and armors. Includes the Chillrend.
descriptionHtml:
My retexture of the Glass gear. This includes the Chillrend which is in the optional files. Do not get it if you have already have a mod that changes the Chillrend.

[b]Description[/b] - Changes how the glass gear looks.

[b]Installation[/b] - Use NMM or to install manually extract the \'Data\' file to your main Skyrim directory. If you would also like the Chillrend extract the DDS file inside of the optional Chillrend download to[i] \'<Your Skyrim Directory>/Data/textures/weapons/glass\'[/i].

[b]Compatibility[/b] - This works with any mod that doesn\'t also replace the glass texture files.


[b]Uninstallation[/b] - Go into your Skyrim directory. Next follow this path: [i]\'Data/textures/armor\'[/i], delete the \'glass folder\'. After you have done that follow this path: [i]\'Data/textures/weapons\'[/i], delete the glass folder. Your armors should now be reset to the Skyrim defaults. If you would just like to remove the Chillrend texture go to your Skyrim directory then [i]\'Data/textures/weapons/glass\'[/i], then delete the DDS file glasssword_chillrend.

[b]Credits[/b] - Bethesda - Skyrim and it\'s assets, Me - Mod
author: Nick1503
